mapper.select: SELECT staff_name , commute_date , commute_arrive , commute_leave , commute_lateness , commute_earlyleave , commute_holiday FROM commute INNER JOIN staff ON commute.staff_id = staff.staff_code AND commute.staff_id = #{staffId} ORDER BY commute_date DESC LIMIT #{startClmn}, #{clmnCnt}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM commute INNER JOIN staff ON commute.staff_id = staff.staff_code AND commute.staff_id = #{staffId}

SELECT holiday_code, staff_name, holiday_from_date, holiday_to_date, holiday_sort FROM holiday INNER JOIN staff ON staff.staff_code=holiday.staff_id WHERE staff_id = #{staffId} ORDER BY holiday_from_date ASC
SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING(holiday_code, 8) AS DECIMAL) AS holidayCode FROM holiday ORDER BY holidayCode DESC LIMIT 1
